name: Bubble Tower
description:
If you're a friend of old school bubble shooters then you'll love Bubble Tower 3D.

Experience this reinvented videogames classic in a completely new dimension and an amazing Aztec setting! Try to connect at least 3 bubbles of the same color to reach the top of the tower. Not enough action happening? Try out the destructive fireball and watch him do his magic.

Let's go and reach the high score.
